LanguageData.AlcoholWithdrawal.stages.alcohol_withdra: Tá mé ag croitheadh. Tá gach rud ag cur isteach orm. Ní fhéadfaidh mé smaoineamh ar rud ar bith eile seachas alcól.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.mild_hangover.label: póit mheasartha
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.mild_hangover.descriptio: Tá an tinneas cinn beagnach imithe.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.serious_hangover.label: póit throm
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.serious_hangover.descrip: Tá tinneas cinn agam ón alcól.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.pounding_hangover.label: póit uafásach
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.pounding_hangover.descri: Braithim ar nós go bhfuil mo cheann ag dul titim ar an urlár.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.alcohol_warmth.label: ar meisce
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.alcohol_warmth.descrip: Tá dea-ghiúmar orm tar éis dom an deoch sin a ól.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.quite_inebriated.label: ar meisce
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.quite_inebriated.descr: Táim ar meisce! Táim ag mothú go maith!
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.drunk.label: ólta
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.drunk.description: Tá mé ólta, agus mothaíonn sé go hiontach!
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.hammered.label: dallta
